text: when one thinks about Hilton Head
they Lexington golf tennis Beach's
shopping and family vacations while
there's no shortage of these activities
here Hilton Head goes way beyond the
golf course I find it to be America's
best hidden gem the streets are squeaky
clean no building is allowed to be
taller than the tree tips it's so
beautiful here that it kind of feels
like a made-up fantasy world I got
advice from a few locals Kelly and
Andrew who gave me the rundown of unique
things to do on the island starting with
dolphin watching there's a healthy
population of dolphins living and
feeding in the nearby salty Marsh waters
we took an early morning boat out to
find them on most dolphin tours you're
lucky to see one or two but we spotted
dozens after that we hopped on bikes to
discover the island on wheels well there
are many mainstream bike paths
connecting the island we ventured deep
into the Sea Pines plantation where we
even met some alligators I'm stunned by
the massive oak trees draped with moss
and hanging over the roads after
exerting all this energy it is finally
time to eat any food he's out there
prepare yourselves I was on a mission to
find the best local dish on the island
and I landed at a restaurant called low
country backyard to get some homemade
shrimp and grits shrimp is found in
abundance all along the islands
coastline and grits
well they're a staple in the south it's
kind of like a corn porridge and similar
to Oh golly in Africa mix them all
together and you have shrimp and grits
my favorite southern dish these shrimp
and grits are honestly the best thing in
the world
I'll say it again Hilton Head is
America's best hidden gem
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
